title: Updates
description: Recent updates and announcements from the ResourcePile team.

posts.heading: Thank You
posts.content: We'd just like to thank all 350 of you who have used our site, ResourcePile, for analysing bow distance statistics with StatTrack, reflecting on past tournaments through LeaugeRec, or reconnecting with your favourite maps from the Overcast Network (and the Avicus Network as well). With over 40% of views going to our Overcast Network map collection, we would just like to thank all the map authors which have provided their maps to ResourcePile and making them accessable to the community which grew to enjoy them greatly. We're always looking to expand our map collection, so if you would like to add your maps to our collection please consider filling out this submission form regarding your creations.

posts.heading: Introducing LeagueRec
posts.author: Matic0B
posts.content:
Today we are happy to announce the addition of LeagueRec to the ResourcePile project.
LeagueRec is a collection of information about competitive events that have been hosted by various networks. We aim to archive information about these events because some networks remove access to the information after a tournament has finished.With the announcement we also already have content you can view.
List of current events on the website:
  • The Omega Championship
  • Race for Victory
  • Avicus League - Season 1
  • Battle of Eternity
  • Project Redemption

posts.heading: Now Accepting Map Submissions
posts.author: mitchiii_
posts.content: We are now accepting map submissions for both maps that were, or are still, in the Overcast or Avicus Network map repository OR any maps that you had previously made for either of these networks that didn't end up making it onto their servers. To add your map to our collection, just fill out the submission form linked below, filling out all the required information, and then wait as we prepare your map for our public listing!

posts.heading: Welcome to ResourcePile
posts.content:
Welcome to ResourcePile, a community driven project with contributors from Overcast Network and Avicus Network groups. This project offers a range of resources and tools related to these networks which can be broken down into three main groups:
  • StatTrack - Tracking various statistics such as longest kill distances by bow, and other website statistics like objective leaderboards
  • MapStack - A collection of publicly downloadable maps from Overcast Network and Avicus Network that players can use on their own servers or privately explore in single player
  • ToolRack - A collection of various other handy tools
Below are a few links to get you started!
